item.title: DIY Durable UV Resistant Plastic Pot
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
In this DIY project, I will show you how I converted a normal plastic container into a UV Resistant Plastic Pot. The materials used for this project are cheap and...

The post DIY Durable UV Resistant Plastic Pot appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
In this DIY project, I will show you how I converted a normal plastic container into a UV Resistant Plastic Pot. The materials used for this project are cheap and easily available.

▼ Materials @ Used ▼

  • Plastic Container
  • Aluminum Foil
  • Cello Tape
  • Metal Rod

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on DIY Durable UV Resistant Plastic Pot. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post DIY Durable UV Resistant Plastic Pot appeared first on Plants My Love.

item.title: How to Prevent Water Seepage in your Terrace Garden
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
In this DIY project, I will show you how I prevent water damage/ seepage in my terrace garden. The materials used for this project are cheap and easily available. So...

The post How to Prevent Water Seepage in your Terrace Garden appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
In this DIY project, I will show you how I prevent water damage/ seepage in my terrace garden. The materials used for this project are cheap and easily available. So you can easily implement it in your terrace garden.

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on how to prevent water seepage in the terrace garden. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

▼ Materials @ Used ▼

  • Brick
  • Plywood
  • Cello Tape
  • Brown Tape
  • Hand Saw

The post How to Prevent Water Seepage in your Terrace Garden appeared first on Plants My Love.
